title: Evolving E-commerce Logistics Planning- Integrating Embedded Technology and Ant Colony Algorithm for Enhanced Efficiency
abstract: arXiv:2402.15965v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: Amidst the era of networking, the e-commerce sector has undergone notable expansion, notably with the advent of Cross-border E-commerce (CBEC) in recent times. This growth trend persists, necessitating robust logistical frameworks to sustainably support operations. However, the current e-commerce logistics paradigm faces challenges in meeting evolving user demands, prompting a quest for innovative solutions. This research endeavors to address these complexities by undertaking a comprehensive analysis of CBEC logistics models and integrating embedded technology into logistical frameworks, resulting in the development of an advanced logistics tracking system. Moreover, employing the ant colony algorithm, the study conducts experimental investigations into optimizing logistics package distribution route planning. Noteworthy enhancements are observed in key metrics such as average delivery time, signaling the efficacy of this approach. In es

translated_title: 不断进化的电子商务物流规划 - 整合嵌入式技术和蚁群算法以提高效率
translated_abstract: 在网络时代的背景下，电子商务行业经历了显著扩张，特别是近年来跨境电子商务（CBEC）的出现。这种增长趋势持续存在，需要健壮的物流框架来可持续支持运营。然而，当前的电子商务物流范式面临着满足不断发展的用户需求的挑战，促使人们寻求创新解决方案。本研究通过对CBEC物流模型进行全面分析，并将嵌入式技术整合到物流框架中，开发了一个高级物流跟踪系统，以解决这些复杂性。此外，采用蚁群算法，研究对物流包裹分发路线进行优化规划实验。在关键指标如平均交货时间方面观察到了显著的改进，表明了这种方法的效果。
tldr: 通过整合嵌入式技术和蚁群算法，本研究开发了一个先进的物流跟踪系统，以优化物流包裹分发路线，显著改进了平均交货时间。
en_tdlr: By integrating embedded technology and ant colony algorithm, this research developed an advanced logistics tracking system to optimize logistics package distribution route and significantly improved the average delivery time.
